name: Jumphobia Free
description:
Are you ready for the ultimate puzzle platforming challenge? There is no jump button, instead you automatically jump when you run off a ledge! You are going to need both skill and intelligence if you hope to beat this game!

It's not going to be easy, not when there are monsters, spikes, buzzsaws, swinging maces, crumble blocks, springs, balloons, gravity flip arrows, fans, ice and bombs to look out for!

The fun doesn't stop there - create your very own levels using the built in level maker

FREE VERSION
- Create your own levels using the built in level maker, and share them with the world!
- 5 free levels
- Awesome 8-bit soundtrack!

FULL VERSION
- Create your own levels using the built in level maker, and share them with the world!
- 21 levels with over 200 rooms to play
- An unlimited number of player made levels to play
- Awesome 8-bit soundtrack!

Monsters and Critics - "Jumphobia is a seriously good platform game" 4.5/5
